column1: Oschatz (German: [oːʃat͡s] (listen)) is a town in the district Nordsachsen
column2: in the Free State of Saxony
column3: Germany. It is located 60 km east of Leipzig and 60 km west of Dresden.

column1: Oschatz lies in the Saxon Lowland and is located on the river Döllnitz
column2: which joins the river Elbe as a left tributary 15 km away near Riesa. Oschatz is situated near the forested regions of the Dahlener Heath as well as the Wermsdorf Forest and the Collmberg. Neighboring districts include: Liebschützberg

column1: The average air temperature in Oschatz is approximately 8.6 °C
column2: the annual rainfall is about 570 millimeters.
